charges.charge_description: 21:841B=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-On or about 6/9/95 dft did possess w/intent to distribute cocaine base (crack) in violation of 21:841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(B) (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a period of 36 months on Count 1s; upon release defendant placed on supervised release for 4 yrs on Count 1s w/special conditions; $50 special assessment due immediately (1s)

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE OR DISPENSE On or about 6/9/95 deft. did knowingly possess a mixture or substance containing cocaine base (crack) with intent to distribute in violation of 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B). (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Original Indictment and Counts 2 &; 3 of the Superseding Indictment dismissed on motion of the Government (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:924C.F FIREARMS On or about 6/9/95 deft. did knowingly use and carry a firearm during and in relation to a drug trafficking crime for which he may be prosecuted in a Court of the US in violation of 18 USC 924(c) (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Original Indictment and Counts 2 &; 3 of the Superseding Indictment dismissed on motion of the Government (2)

charges.charge_description: 18:924G.F FIREARMS-On or about 6/9/95 dft did use &; carry a firearm during and in relation to a drug trafficking crime in violation of 18;924(c) (2s)

charges.charge_disposition: Original Indictment and Counts 2 &; 3 of the Superseding Indictment dismissed on motion of the Government (2s)

charges.charge_description: 18:922G.F FIREARMS On or about 6/9/95, deft. did knowingly possess a firearm which had previously travelled in interstate commerce, the deft. having been previously convicted under the laws of the St.of IL. of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year in violation of 18 USC 922(g) and 924(a)(2) (3)

charges.charge_disposition: Original Indictment and Counts 2 &; 3 of the Superseding Indictment dismissed on motion of the Government (3)

charges.charge_description: 18:922G.F FIREARMS-On or about 6/9/95 dft did possess a firearm, the dft having been previously convicted of a felony in violation of 18:922(g) &; 924(a)(2) (3s)

charges.charge_disposition: Original Indictment and Counts 2 &; 3 of the Superseding Indictment dismissed on motion of the Government (3s)
